评论详情: These are so cute, my second pair. They don’t have too much stretch though. Even though they fit, after a while it seems like the seams start to separate. Just the nature of the fabric. Still worth it.

Wore with a sequin top for a holiday party and these looked so great. Thick and didn’t show any underwear lines, and liked that they had stretch, which helped hold me in without looking like a can of popped biscuits (iykyk)

I got a recommendation from a friend to try jeans of this brand. I didn’t regret. They fit very well, the quality of the product is good and i love it!
There was NO shape in the butt at all. I typically wear a 26-27 jeans and they gave me major pancake but and gapping at the waist.

great!

Ya’ll! These are amazeballs! Do note that they are true high-waisted. I’m a typical body and these came up to my belly button. They fit perfectly and I wanted to keep wearing them around my house! These jeans fit like a glove.  Love them better than my Citizens for Humanity - which were way more expensive.

Super cute jeans and they are comfortable. Sometimes when I sit down the button digs into my stomach uncomfortably though. I have skinny ankles and I appreciate that these jeans are not too large around the ankle.
Order 1 size up!!! I typically purchase Joe or AG jeans and the quality of these are right there w/ those other high end brands, but these run at least a full size smaller.

I love these pants as I’ve owned them before but the ones sent to me from this seller smell HORRIBLE. I washed them on sanitize and they still smell bad. They will have to go in the trash. Such a waste of money! Do NOT buy.
